def main():
    T=int(input())
    hole=['A','D','O','P','R','Q']
    
    for i in range(T):
        A=raw_input()
        A=list(A)
        count=0


        for i in A:
            if(i in hole):
                count+=1
            elif(i=='B'):
                count+=2
                
        print(count)


main()
